special_text:
[i]“Shhhhh...” it said. Though it had no mouth.”
–Statement of Chloe Ashburt[/i]
I – Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
II – Search your library for a card with changeling, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
III – The next Shapeshifter spell you cast this turn costs {2} less to cast.
